name: Do it!
description:
Doit? is a simple arcade video game that presents several situations in which the player must interact in a short amount of time using a simple mechanic: to touch or not the button. Depeding on what you do, funny things will happen to avatar such as being hit by a car, getting burn with hott coffee or be attacked by your own dog. Do you dare to press the button?

This game was made in 2018 by:

Carlota Blázquez https://twitter.com/TheKreat0r

Ignacio Eguren https://twitter.com/MegaKiiromon

Silvia Rodríguez https://twitter.com/Merthirdeye
